Package com.toedter.plaf

Class JCalendarTheme

java.lang.Object
javax.swing.plaf.metal.MetalTheme
javax.swing.plaf.metal.DefaultMetalTheme
com.toedter.plaf.JCalendarTheme
public class JCalendarTheme
extends javax.swing.plaf.metal.DefaultMetalTheme
The JCalendar theme. The colors are based on the theme "Experience Bue" of the great Plastic3D Look and feel by JGoddies (www.jgoodies.com)
Version:
$Revision: 1.0 $
Author:
Kai Toedter, (Last changed by: $author$)
